html:
Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Classical) IPA(key): /ˈkon.li.ɡoː/, [ˈkɔn̪.lʲɪ.ɡoː]
  • (Ecclesiastical) IPA(key): /ˈkon.li.ɡo/, [ˈkɔn.li.ɡɔ]

Etymology 1[edit]

Verb[edit]

conligō (present infinitive conligāre, perfect active conligāvī, supine conligātum); first conjugation

  1. Alternative form of colligō
Conjugation[edit]

Etymology 2[edit]

Verb[edit]

conligō (present infinitive conligere, perfect active conlēgī, supine conlēctum); third conjugation

  1. Alternative form of colligō
